Release info:

Game information:  

Marlow Briggs and The Mask of Death - action adventure distributed
via digital services.
The game takes place in Central America, where the main character is
sent Marlowe Briggs to deal with the evil associated with the ancient
Mayan death mask. On the way he will find many enemies and dangers
filled locations.


RePack Features:  

Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death
Do not cut / recoded
